<u>Analogy between Foliation and Cleavage.<\u>
If the arrangement of the foliation which
has been just described be compared with that of
the cleavage planes of the true Slates which I
have <s>described<\s> explained elsewhere** the two phenomena will
be found to correspond in all their main features;
both <s>being<\s> forming great arches bounded by vertical
planes, with the <s>common<\s> peculiarity that in both
the dip of the divisional surfaces is least at
the central axis & gradually encreases towards
the boundaries till it becomes perpendicular. The
